ComicInfo.Summary:
Mike Costa delivers the brutal conclusion as Belladonna and Skene have a final battle! Her fury burns bright like the hottest forge and only the blood of the witch queen Skene can quell the fires. But the devilish sorceress is unlike any foe Belladonna has faced before. Using dark sex magics she warps reality and perception leaving all in her wake vulnerable.
Boundless offers a host of sexy stunning covers with this issue including a Regular Cover & Wraparound Covers by series artist Nahuel Lopez, Shield Maiden by Matt Martin, Blood Lust by Raulo Caceres, and Killer Body Cover by Renato Camilo. Plus an array of super limited covers for the collector including Costume Change Set (3 books, limited to 250 sets), Nude & Naughty Set (3 books, Limited to 350 sets) by Christian Zanier, and a Century Nude Set (4 books, limited to 100 copies ea.) by Richard Ortiz. And for the erotic art collectors, we have Nude& Wrap Nude Covers by Lopez, Shield Maiden Nude by Martin, Blood Lust Nude by Caceres, Killer Body Nude Cover by Camilo, and an extra saucy Shield Maiden Adult Cover also by Martin!
